description: Performed comparative study between pre and post image for Colong during 2021 flood. A simple technique to subtract pre and post image is done to know the change in water content due to flood in that region.

parameters.description: Left-closed temporal interval, i.e. an array with exactly two elements: The first element is the start of the temporal interval. The specified instance in time is included in the interval. The second element is the end of the temporal interval. The specified instance in time is excluded from the interval. The specified temporal strings follow RFC 3339. Also supports open intervals by setting one of the boundaries to null, but never both.
parameters.name: Previous_date

parameters.description: Left-closed temporal interval, i.e. an array with exactly two elements: The first element is the start of the temporal interval. The specified instance in time is included in the interval.The second element is the end of the temporal interval. The specified instance in time is excluded from the interval. The specified temporal strings follow RFC 3339. Also supports open intervals by setting one of the boundaries to null, but never both.
parameters.name: After_date

parameters.description: Spatial extent for area of interst to calculate NBR, specified as GEOJSON.
parameters.name: aoi

returns: Return an RGB image as Geotiff.
summary: Comparing pre and post flood NDWI.
